name: Dinner Tonight: Greens Beans with Sesame Vinaigrette
description: I wasn’t event thinking about the side dish. My mind was focused on that cranberry-chipotle sauce and the protein it was going to drip all over, when I casually tossed the idea to the fiancée that we should eat something...

recipeInstructions.text: Toast the sesame seeds in a skillet over medium heat. Cook until they begin to smell lovely.
Bring a pot of water to boil, season with salt. Toss the beans in beans and cook for 4-5 minutes. When done, drain and then plunge in ice water. Pat dry.
Whisk together the olive oil, sesame oil, white-wine vinegar, and Dijon mustard. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
